trans-unit.source: Imports Web Services Description Language (WSDL) 1.1 metadata with WS-Policy attachments.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> class.
Use the WsdlImporter constructor to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> object from a set of metadata documents.
A collection of metadata documents from which to extract contract, endpoint, and binding information.
Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> object from the specified metadata, custom policy importers, and custom WSDL importers.
Use this constructor to control the metadata to be imported and the policy and WSDL importers to be used.
> [!NOTE] > If custom policy importers or custom WSDL importers are passed to this constructor any custom importers specified in application configuration files are not loaded.
If you want to add a custom importer, you must reconstruct the importers collections prior to using this constructor.
See the Example section.
The downloaded metadata.
The custom policy importers used to import custom policy statements.
The custom WSDL importers used to import custom WSDL elements.
The metadata argument is .
Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> object from the specified metadata, custom policy importers, and custom WSDL importers.
Use this constructor to control the metadata to be imported and the policy and WSDL importers to be used.
> [!NOTE] > If custom policy importers or custom WSDL importers are passed to this constructor any custom importers specified in application configuration files are not loaded.
If you want to add a custom importer, you must reconstruct the importers collections prior to using this constructor.
See the Example section.
The downloaded metadata.
The custom policy importers used to import custom policy statements.
The custom WSDL importers used to import custom WSDL elements.
The amount of metadata to retrieve at a time
The metadata argument is .
Returns a set of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> objects imported from the metadata documents.
Use the ImportAllBindings method to import all binding information from the metadata documents and return them as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> objects.
Check the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned objects.
To import a specific WSDL binding, see the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter.ImportBinding%2A> method.
A set of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> objects imported from the metadata documents.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> has encountered an error.
Returns a set of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> objects that represent port type information in the metadata documents.
Use the ImportAllContracts method to import all WSDL port type information from the metadata documents and return them as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> objects.
It is recommended to check the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned objects.
To import only one port type, see the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter.ImportContract%2A> method.
A set of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> objects that represent port type information in the metadata documents.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> has encountered an error.
Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"></xref> that represents the endpoints in WSDL documents.
Use the ImportAllEndpoints method to import all endpoint information from the metadata documents and return them as a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects.
Check the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned objects.
To import only a specific WSDL port, see the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter.ImportEndpoint%2A> method.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"></xref> that represents the endpoints in WSDL documents.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> has encountered an error.
Returns a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> object that represents binding information from a set of metadata documents.

Use the ImportBinding method to use a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding?displayProperty=fullName> object to locate binding information in the metadata and return that binding information as a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding?displayProperty=fullName> object.
Check the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned object.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> object that represents binding information in a metadata file.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding?displayProperty=fullName> object that represents binding information from a set of metadata documents.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> has encountered an error.
The wsdlBinding parameter is .
Returns a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> object that represents metadata located by the specified port type information.

Use the ImportContract method to use a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType?displayProperty=fullName> object to locate port type information in the metadata and return that information as a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> object.
Check the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned object.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref> object that represents the desired port type.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> object that represents metadata located by the specified port type information.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> has encountered an error.
The port type is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Returns a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> from a set of metadata documents that uses information from the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref> object.

Use the ImportEndpoint method to use a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port?displayProperty=fullName> object to locate port type information in the metadata and return that information as a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> object.
Check the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned object.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref> object that represents the desired WSDL port information.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> object that represents specific WSDL port information in the metadata document.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> has encountered an error.
The wsdlPort is .

Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"></xref> that represents all WSDL port types using the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref>.
Check the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned object.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> object used in a WSDL port.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"></xref> that represents all WSDL port types using the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> has encountered an error.
The wsdlBinding is .

Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"></xref> that represents all WSDL port types associated with the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref>.
Check the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned object.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref> object that is used to find associated WSDL port information.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"></xref> that represents all WSDL port types associated with the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> has encountered an error.
The wsdlPortType is .

Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"></xref> that represents all WSDL port types within the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"></xref>.
Check the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned object.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"></xref> object within which to search for WSDL port information.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"></xref> that represents all WSDL port types within the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> has encountered an error.
The wsdlService is .
Gets a set of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> objects that describe the contract information in the metadata documents.
The WsdlDocuments property is not populated until an import method is called.
A collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> objects that describe the contract information in the metadata documents.
Gets a set of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension"></xref> objects used to import custom WSDL information.
Use the WsdlImportExtensions property to add or remove custom WSDL importers.
A set of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension"></xref> objects used to import custom WSDL information.
Gets a set of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects that describe types in the metadata.
This property is not populated until one of the import methods is called.
A set of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects that describe types in the metadata.
